name: Childhood Daydream
description:
Hello everyone !

This is the very first Ludum Dare of my Jam Team.

By taking the theme "Growing", we wanted to show the evolution to the complete maturity of a kid, followed by his favorite toys, Teddy Beast and Super Doll, in a nervous beat them all.

We couldn't do everything we wanted with a time so short, but we are preparing you a complete version with a lot of features.

Please enjoy :)

Development team :

"Chouquette" : Game Design / Level Design / Programming
Loup Druet : Game Design / Lead Programmmer
Quentin Roze : Killed by us during the Jam
Simon Buty : Environment Design / Colourist
Corinne Fenoglio : Character Design / Animation
Léa Lescuyer : Asset Design / Lead Colourist
